changeSet.sql: WITH succsess_checks AS ( SELECT checks.id, checks.task, p2p.state, tasks.max_xp FROM checks INNER JOIN p2p ON checks.id = p2p.check_id LEFT JOIN verter ON checks.id = verter.check_id INNER JOIN tasks ON checks.task = tasks.title WHERE p2p.state = 'Success' AND (verter.state = 'Success' OR verter.state is null) ) INSERT INTO xp (check_id, xp_amount) SELECT id, (max_xp * (1 - 0.25 * random()))::int FROM succsess_checks;
